#: DMCG123 changed the world a bit at a time by saying (astral date: 7/7/2006 11:14 AM) :#
> Answering part of my own question:
> 
>> Finally, is there scope for releasing the test class instances after each test has run? This 
>> would give us a much smaller footprint for large test suites, without having to assign 
>> fields to null in @After.
> 
> It looks like this does happen, At least via Eclipse, instances of my test classes are being 
> garbage collected. Again - is this behaviour I can rely on?
> 
> Duncan
> 
> 
> 
> 

I think that you still need to release all resources in an @After, because you cannot guarantee when 
the GC will be invoked.

./alex
--
.w( the_mindstorm )p.
